entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sandy Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:53 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -23.7°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 29 in the evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
